snippet: One of Broadway’s greatest flops, “Carrie” is being dressed up, and toned down, for another onstage dance.
abstract: MCC Theater presents Off-Broadway revival of the horror musical Carrie, which was a commercial and critical flop when it premiered on Broadway in 1998; current production is much more toned down with a completely revised script and less simulated blood.
lead_paragraph: One of Broadway’s greatest flops, “Carrie” is being dressed up, and toned down, for another onstage dance.

headline.seo: ‘Carrie,’ a Huge Stage Flop, Is Reinvented by MCC Theater
headline.main: An Outsider Gets a Nicer Date for the Prom
headline.print_headline: An Outsider Gets A Nicer Date For the Prom
